translation.en: [man] There's really nothing...
translation.zh: （纳瓦霍族保留地腹地） 钦利这地方非常冷清

translation.en: goin' on in Chinle.
There's no clubs. No dance, no movie theater...
There's really no outlet for the kids or the adults.
translation.zh: 也没有针对儿童或成人的大卖场

translation.en: We're on the rez.
translation.zh: 这里是保留地 只有…

translation.en: It's like, uh... alcohol and the, uh...
translation.zh: 这里是保留地 只有… 酗酒 以及…

translation.en: bad side of life... home environment,
translation.zh: 生活的阴暗面 糟糕的居家环境

translation.en: violence, maybe...
havin', uh... alcoholic parents and stuff.
Chinle basketball is kind of, like, uh...
translation.zh: 在钦利 对某些人来说

translation.en: an addiction to some people.
It brings a little bit of happiness for them.
translation.zh: 能给他们带来些许快乐

translation.en: -[boys chanting] Ooh, aah, ooh, aah! -[cheering]
[man] Our student athletes are kind of a... a modern-day warrior.
translation.zh: 我们的学生球员像是当代的勇士

translation.en: And in our culture,
a warrior is defined as somebody who represents their people...
translation.zh: 勇士是指代表人民的人

translation.en: not just a fighter.
[commentator] Fired and locked down.
[laughs] I love it.
[boy] This team actually could make history for Chinle.
translation.zh: 这支球队有可能为钦利创造历史

translation.en: It could win Chinle's first state championship, you know.
translation.zh: 有可能为钦利赢得首个州冠军

translation.en: We always dream big.
translation.zh: 我们一直抱有远大理想

translation.en: Good job! Good job!
[man] If we could raise a state title banner,
translation.zh: 如果我们能升起州冠军旗帜

translation.en: the pride it would bring to our community...
translation.zh: 那带给我们社区的荣耀…

translation.en: It... It would mean everything.
A state title is a chance for our kids to get noticed
translation.zh: 如果获得州冠军我们的孩子将有机会

translation.en: outside the reservation,
translation.zh: 被保留地以外的人注意到

translation.en: and maybe even give them a shot at a better life.
translation.zh: 甚至让他们有机会过上更好的生活

translation.en: [commentator] What a night. What a night at Chinle.
translation.zh: 多么美好的夜晚啊 钦利的美好夜晚

translation.en: [man] We want them to make history in Chinle.
translation.zh: 我们盼望他们在钦利创造历史

translation.en: They have that potential.
It's... it's right there for them.
And this year, I believe we can finally do it.
translation.zh: 我相信 今年我们终于要夺冠了

translation.en: [Shaun] Chinle is a town of about 4,500 people.
It's right in the heart of the Navajo Nation.
translation.zh: （纳瓦霍族保留地） 位于纳瓦霍族保留地的腹地

translation.en: The Nation is over 27,000 square miles,
translation.zh: 保留地的面积超过七万平方公里

translation.en: and it extends into three different states,
Arizona, Utah and New Mexico.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州、犹他州和新墨西哥州

translation.en: In northeastern Arizona, we don't have a Triple-A farm team.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州的东北部没有3A级预备队

translation.en: We don't have a semi-pro football or baseball team.
translation.zh: 我们没有半职业的橄榄球队或篮球队

translation.en: We have a high school basketball team.
translation.zh: 我们有一支高中篮球队

translation.en: -Hello. -Hey, Sophie, Shaun here.
translation.zh: -喂？-嘿 苏菲 我是肖恩

translation.en: -Shaun. Good morning. -Good morning.
Five years ago, when I was first hired as athletic director,
translation.zh: 五年前 我刚被聘为体育主任的时候

translation.en: our basketball team won four games,
translation.zh: 我们的篮球队赢了四场比赛

translation.en: and that's just not gonna cut it around here.
translation.zh: 在这里 这是不够的

translation.en: -Okay. Thanks, Sophie. -Bye.
translation.zh: -好的 谢谢 苏菲-再见

translation.en: The way I view this whole department,
translation.zh: 我对这个项目的看法是

translation.en: is I want the best for my kids.
translation.zh: 必须为孩子们创造最好的条件

translation.en: I call all these kids "my kids".
translation.zh: 我把这些孩子当做自己的孩子

translation.en: You know, I want the best coach available for my kids.
translation.zh: 我希望我的孩子们有最好的教练

translation.en: We decided we wanted Coach Mendoza,
translation.zh: 我们决定聘请门多萨教练

translation.en: and we were able to land him two years ago.
He's coached for over 40 years.
He's been to eight final fours.
He's been to four state title games,
and he's even won the Arizona state championships.
translation.zh: 甚至夺得过亚利桑那州冠军

translation.en: He's a legend on the rez.
translation.zh: 他是保留地的传奇教练

translation.en: And, oh, yeah, name me one other high school coach in America
translation.zh: 除了他 美国还有哪个高中教练

translation.en: that has had Kareem Abdul-Jabbar as an assistant coach.
translation.zh: 能让卡里姆·阿卜杜勒-贾巴尔给他做助理教练？

translation.en: I'll see you.
[Shaun] He knows the struggles we deal with,
translation.zh: 他明白我们面临的困难

translation.en: he knows what it takes to take a team like ours
translation.zh: 他知道如何率领我们这样的球队

translation.en: deep into the tournament bracket.
Got to keep the dogs out.
[Coach Mendoza] As a head coach, my whole purpose is to win a state championship.
translation.zh: 作为主教练我的目标就是夺得州冠军

translation.en: I knew that Chinle's always had talent.
translation.zh: 我知道钦利从来都不缺好苗子

translation.en: With my background, I always believed
translation.zh: 凭我的经验 我始终相信

translation.en: that there's always a first time.
And so, when I first came up here two years back,
translation.zh: 所以 两年前我刚来的时候

translation.en: I said, "Hey, we wanna win a state championship."
translation.zh: 我说“嘿 我们的目标是州冠军”

translation.en: Right away, I started telling the kids that, you know, that's our goal.
translation.zh: 我马上就把这个目标告诉了孩子们

translation.en: Saying, "You gotta believe, you gotta believe."
translation.zh: 我说：“你们一定要有信心”

translation.en: I think with the kids, a lot of it is psychological.
translation.zh: 对这些孩子来说 很多问题是心理层面的

translation.en: So we've been talking about a lot of things
translation.zh: 所以我跟他们谈过很多

translation.en: and trying to build up to this point,
translation.zh: 试着奠定良好的心理素质

translation.en: you know, trying to get them to relax
to where they... they're able to... to go and play,
and not worry about other things, distractions...
translation.zh: 不会担心别的事情 不会分心…

translation.en: But, we'll see.
Coach Mendoza, he knows what it takes to change lives,
translation.zh: 门多萨教练懂得如何改变孩子们的生活

translation.en: using basketball as a catalyst with education.
translation.zh: 如何将篮球作为教育的催化剂

translation.en: There's many student athletes he's coached
that have received college scholarships,
translation.zh: 很多都获得了大学奖学金

translation.en: that are off doing bigger and better things in the world.
translation.zh: 后来还干出了一番大事业

translation.en: Before I came here, they had ten coaches in... in eight years.
translation.zh: 在我之前 他们八年内换了十个教练

translation.en: So, if Chinle will keep me here,
translation.zh: 所以 如果钦利高中愿意让我干下去

translation.en: I would love to stay here and coach for...
translation.zh: 我很想干下去 长期…

translation.en: for a long time.
But that's not a... a given.
Hey, if we... if we play well, everything will fall in place.
translation.zh: 如果我们打得好 一切都会水到渠成

translation.en: If we don't play well, then...
translation.zh: 如果打得不好 那么…

translation.en: we don't get it done.
Okay.
Meal check for tomorrow...
Okay, good.
-Plus car. -Thank you.
The kids will love to know that we've got meals.
translation.zh: 知道明天有饭吃 孩子们会很高兴

translation.en: -All right. All right, Coach. -Thank you.
[Raul] Okay, on the baseline.
[Raul] Hustle.
Okay, listen.
Now, tomorrow...
first game of the year.
You have to know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 你们必须做到心里有底

translation.en: The biggest thing you've got to remember,
if we can take care of the ball,
if everybody can do that as a group, we'll be tough to beat.
translation.zh: 如果每名队员都能好好发挥对手将很难战胜我们

translation.en: [Shaun] Our particular brand here in this area...
translation.zh: 在该地区 我们有个独特的称号

translation.en: we play rezball.
Let's go. No dribble. No dribble. Go.
Just go hard, just go hard. Don't dribble.
Rezball is a unique style of basketball...
translation.zh: 保留地篮球是一种风格独特的篮球打法

translation.en: and suits our strengths.
translation.zh: 有利于发挥我们的优势

translation.en: [player] Rezball's just like running and gunning,
translation.zh: 保留地篮球的特点是跑动和投篮

translation.en: just pushing the ball, pushing the ball,
getting the open shot, taking the shot, coming back down,
translation.zh: 拉出空当 投篮命中 然后回撤防守

translation.en: and doing the same thing over and over.
[Shaun] As Navajo people, were not very big in stature.
translation.zh: 纳瓦霍人的身材不是很高大

translation.en: So, for us to be effective against some of these bigger teams,
translation.zh: 所以要想有效地对抗比我们高大的对手

translation.en: we basically have to run them out of the gym.
translation.zh: 我们必须靠跑动拖垮他们

translation.en: [Josiah] Rezball to us is, like, really fun.
translation.zh: 对我们来说 保留地篮球充满乐趣

translation.en: So we just like to have fun with it and we love to push the ball.
translation.zh: 所以我们喜欢打着玩 喜欢传球

translation.en: Our coach really doesn't like that kind of basketball,
and tells us to stay away from it.
[Raul] Hold it, hold it, hold it. Now... Hold it.
You're just running around.
Make sure you know where you're supposed to go.
translation.zh: 一定要注意跑动的位置

translation.en: Do it again, do it again.
[Raul] Rezball.
You know...
I really don't understand it,
but that's... that's why I asked.
There's no... structure.
Not there, not there! We--
We're not being patient.
We're trying to take every... first shot that comes around. We don't want that.
Calm down a little bit, you're trying to rush everything.
translation.zh: 节奏放慢一点 你们太着急了

translation.en: I love to run, as long as there's a structure.
translation.zh: 我喜欢队员跑动 但必须要有章法

translation.en: And I always try to tell the kids, you know,
"You have to make the best decision."
Okay, hold it, hold it. Yeah. Again.
translation.zh: 好 暂停 我再说一次

translation.en: We're just bunching up, guys. That's not what we want.
translation.zh: 你们都挤成一团了 不要这样

translation.en: Let's do it again. I want to walk through it.
translation.zh: 再来一次 再试一次

translation.en: My job is to teach the kids how to play basketball,
translation.zh: 我的工作是教会这些孩子打篮球

translation.en: and learn how to play,
and be able to play the game as it should be played.
translation.zh: 让他们学会正确的打法

translation.en: Recognize it. Move the ball.
There it is, right there.
There you go.
[player] Coach has won championships.
So he has the experience to know,
or he knows what to do to get there.
So that's how, we just follow him.
Defensively is probably the... the thing I'm concerned about.
If everybody plays good defense, then we'll...
translation.zh: 如果每个人都能防守好 我们…

translation.en: I-- I guarantee you, it's almost a given that we can do well.
translation.zh: 我向你们保证我们一定能取得好成绩

translation.en: Be patient. That's gonna be the difference.
translation.zh: 要有耐心 这是成败的关键

translation.en: Now, tomorrow, everybody wear slacks,
translation.zh: 好了 明天所有人穿长裤

translation.en: a dress shirt, a tie...
and hopefully, you shave, okay?
translation.zh: 最好刮一下胡子 懂吗？

translation.en: If you... If you look good...
they're gonna say, "Oh, man. These guys mean business."
translation.zh: 这样别人会觉得我们是认真的

translation.en: Okay? Here we go. Break!
[all] One, two, three, Wildcats!
[Raul] You wanna shoot for a few minutes, that's okay.
translation.zh: 你们可以再练一会儿投篮

translation.en: Get your jerseys over here so we can put them in the wash.
translation.zh: 把球衣放在这里 我们拿去洗

translation.en: [player] Coach, I don't have to shave, right? Am I good?
translation.zh: 教练 我不用刮胡子 没问题吧？

translation.en: Get the laundry.
This year is a... a special group of kids.
translation.zh: 今年的这帮孩子很特别

translation.en: Because of my background, I'm able to relate them.
translation.zh: 由于个人背景的关系我和他们很有默契

translation.en: I can understand them.
Home wasn't a pleasant situation for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说 家不是什么好地方

translation.en: I know there's a detergent somewhere, but I don't know where it is.
translation.zh: 我知道这里有洗衣粉就是不知道在哪儿

translation.en: My mom and my dad divorced when I was a year old.
translation.zh: 我一岁的时候 父母离婚了

translation.en: So I never saw my dad.
I met him when I was about 13 years old.
translation.zh: 大约13岁的时候 我见到了他

translation.en: He said, "Hi," and I said, "Hi," that was it.
translation.zh: 相互打个招呼 仅此而已

translation.en: And then he told me that he was an alcoholic,
and, uh... within a year, he passed on.
I became personally responsible for my half-brothers and sisters.
translation.zh: 我开始照顾同父异母的弟弟妹妹

translation.en: At the time, I had to haul water, chop wood...
did everything a man had to do,
because there was no man in the house.
I was the... I was the man.
It was hard, but I had no choice.
translation.zh: 生活很辛苦 但是没有办法

translation.en: For me, it was a matter of survival.
translation.zh: 对我来说 那是为了生存

translation.en: Opening up against Snowflake...
It's always... That's a tough game.
It's always a tough game.
And just to open up against them is pretty challenging.
translation.zh: 首战遇到他们 难度很大

translation.en: Our team...
kind of grew up together.
We always dreamed of winning State.
translation.zh: 我们一直梦想夺得州冠军

translation.en: Uh, this is our year where we could probably make school history,
translation.zh: 今年我们有可能为学校创造历史

translation.en: 'cause Chinle has never won a state championship before.
translation.zh: 钦利高中从未拿过州冠军

translation.en: So, that would be nice for us to be the first ones to win State.
translation.zh: 如果我们为学校夺得第一个州冠军那会很棒

translation.en: And it would be a big goal for us, be a big dream.
translation.zh: 这是我们的远大目标和梦想

translation.en: And I would love that very much.
Just probably be a good memory to look back on when we get older. You know?
translation.zh: 今后回忆起来 或许是一段美好的记忆

translation.en: [Josiah] Around here on the reservation,
you can't find a good paying job without a degree anymore.
translation.zh: 没有学位已经很难找到高薪工作了

translation.en: The only way for me to get into college right now
translation.zh: 现在对我来说 要想读大学

translation.en: is through an athletic scholarship.
translation.zh: 就必须拿到体育奖学金

translation.en: It's really stressful, but...
whenever I want to give up,
I just think about my family.
As a son, I...
I love him.
Every day, in and out, we hug each other.
translation.zh: 每天出门和回家 我们都会相互拥抱

translation.en: And he's my big baby.
All three of my kids.
Since he was small, he was always active.
He went and did a lot of sports.
I saved all his bibs.
translation.zh: 他的球衣号码我都留着

translation.en: Some of them I put away.
And then, these are all...
all his medals...
here, and... and it is heavy.
Some coaches...
tell him that he's too short,
but then he determines.
He says, "I'll prove you wrong."
And he does.
I'm so proud of my son.
I've always been...
counted out or something
just because of my height.
But, you know, that doesn't bother me.
When I'm playing, it feels like I'm just as tall as everyone else.
translation.zh: 打球的时候我并不觉得自己比别人矮

translation.en: You know, I think that strength comes from...
my struggles that I went through as a... as a kid.
translation.zh: 与我小时候受过的磨难有关

translation.en: I have a lot of good memories with my dad.
translation.zh: 关于父亲 我有很多美好的回忆

translation.en: Kids always think their dads are the best man in the world.
translation.zh: 小孩子总是觉得爸爸是世界上最好的人

translation.en: You know, we'd always go to the beach and stuff like that.
One of the funniest things actually was
when we went to Washington DC,
translation.zh: 有一次我们去华盛顿特区

translation.en: I think we dressed for summer, but it was snowing over there.
translation.zh: 我们穿着夏天的衣服结果那边在下雪

translation.en: [laughs] We ended up just buying jackets, because it was so cold.
translation.zh: 我们不得不买外套 因为冷死了

translation.en: When we relocated here, it actually took a lot out of us.
translation.zh: 搬来这里之后 我们失去了很多东西

translation.en: My dad used to actually kind of treat my mom bad sometimes.
translation.zh: 爸爸有时候对妈妈很不好

translation.en: I would see him intoxicated a lot.
translation.zh: 我经常看见他喝得醉醺醺的

translation.en: Dad left us.
And, you know, I didn't want to believe it.
I'm like, "How could he leave us? How could he do this to us?" You know?
translation.zh: 心想“他怎么能离开我们？ 他怎么能这样对我们？”

translation.en: That's when things started going downhill for us.
translation.zh: 然后日子就一天不如一天

translation.en: We had no running water, we had no electricity.
translation.zh: 我们没有自来水 没有电

translation.en: Sometimes, we would have to go to my relatives' to shower.
translation.zh: 有时候不得不去亲戚家洗澡

translation.en: But, you know, my mom, she worked really hard,
translation.zh: 但是妈妈… 她非常辛苦地工作 找了份工作

translation.en: she got a job, and now, she got us running water,
translation.zh: 她非常辛苦地工作 找了份工作 让我们有了自来水和电

translation.en: she got us electricity, you know?
translation.zh: 让我们有了自来水和电

translation.en: She puts food on the table for us.
She does all this for me,
and that's why I do what I do,
translation.zh: 所以我现在这么努力 因为…

translation.en: because I want to get a... get a scholarship to go to college
translation.zh: 所以我现在这么努力 因为… 我想拿到奖学金 去读大学

translation.en: and, uh, you know, get a good paying job, so I can take care of her
translation.zh: 找一份高收入的工作 好好照顾她

translation.en: the way she took care of me.
I'm happy...
and my kids motivate me to keep going every day.
translation.zh: 孩子们让我有动力每天去打拼

translation.en: This is my sister, Tia.
She's gonna be taller than me, 'cause, you know, she had a different dad.
translation.zh: 她以后会比我高 因为她和我是同母异父

translation.en: I'm going to make sure she becomes a good person
translation.zh: 我一定会让她成为一个有出息的人

translation.en: you know, be the best person that she can be.
translation.zh: 尽可能成为最有出息的人

translation.en: But, definitely, I'm gonna make sure that she's a better person than me.
translation.zh: 我一定会让她比我更有出息

translation.en: I want to be like my brother.
He makes me happy.
When Mom's gone, he hugs me...
translation.zh: 妈妈不在的时候 他会拥抱我…

translation.en: so I can be safe, and...
translation.zh: 让我觉得很安全 而且…

translation.en: -It's okay. -[sniffles]
[crying] So... I want to be just like my brother.
translation.zh: 所以 我想像哥哥一样

translation.en: Okay. I think she's done talking now.
It doesn't really matter where you come from, or...
translation.zh: 无论你来自哪里 受过怎样的苦难

translation.en: what kind of struggles you had.
It's just how much you can take and keep moving forward.
translation.zh: 重要的是不被打垮 继续前进

translation.en: Yeah, I shed my tears here and there.
translation.zh: 我有时也会流泪 但我会继续前行

translation.en: I just keep going, just to always think of my family.
translation.zh: 我有时也会流泪 但我会继续前行 心里始终挂念着家人

translation.en: [man] You know what I think...
[Raul] You're a sophomore, you're a senior.
translation.zh: （比赛日 对阵雪花高中前九小时）

translation.en: We're ready for our picture.
All right, guys.
[Shaun] Our families can have warriors.
Obviously, our tribe has warriors.
translation.zh: 显然 我们的部族中有勇士

translation.en: And here, our basketball team
serves as our school and community warriors.
translation.zh: -将成为学校和社区的勇士-严肃点

translation.en: [photographer] One serious. Okay, a serious one.
translation.zh: -将成为学校和社区的勇士-严肃点 好好拍一张

translation.en: [Shaun] These young men go out
and represent our people on the basketball court
translation.zh: 代表我们的人民 踏上

translation.en: all over the state of Arizona.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州的各个篮球场

translation.en: Do your crazy pose.
[Shaun] Some of these kids don't have parental figures around.
translation.zh: 其中一些孩子没有父母

translation.en: [Shaun] The family that they create within themselves on the team,
translation.zh: 他们队友之间亲如一家

translation.en: it's literally a second family that our kids are creating.
translation.zh: 球队就是他们的第二个家

translation.en: That's exciting to me.
You look like Zion now.
We won't get your muscles all in the frame.
translation.zh: 我们想拍下你们的肌肉

translation.en: [Raul] This team that we have,
they're a young team, but they're very talented.
translation.zh: 虽然年轻 但是很有才华

translation.en: [photographer] All right, Cooper, we need a basketball move now.
translation.zh: 好了 库珀 我们需要拍一张运球的照片

translation.en: You ready?
[Raul] I always believed that you want your captains
translation.zh: 我一直认为 队长应该拥有好的品格…正直

translation.en: to have character... uh, integrity, you know,
translation.zh: 队长应该拥有好的品格…正直

translation.en: things, like... that make them different from everybody else.
And Cooper is a... I think he's a special young man.
translation.zh: 而库珀…他是个很特别的年轻人

translation.en: Hey! Watch your ankle. Watch your ankle.
So, I say, "Hey, I want you to be one of the captains.
translation.zh: 所以我问他：“我想让你当队长

translation.en: Is that okay with you?"
And he said he'd accept the challenge.
translation.zh: 他说愿意接受这个挑战

translation.en: You ready? Three, two, one... Nice.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？一、二、三 很好

translation.en: And for him, as a sophomore,
he's not afraid to take that role and accept it.
And I told him, I said, "You know,
we're gonna go as far as you take us."
translation.zh: 我们能走多远 全看你了”

translation.en: [Cooper] For being a captain is that role to lead everyone and be an example.
translation.zh: 队长的职责是率领球队 以身作则

translation.en: It's an honor, you know.
I feel that... a lot of pride from that.
And I use it to, like, push myself, keep that fire in me going,
translation.zh: 我以此激励自己 保持自己的斗志

translation.en: to light up the fire in everyone.
[commentator] Cooper Burbank, with the drive.
And the lay-in is good!
What a move by Cooper Burbank!
translation.zh: 库珀·伯班克的动作漂亮极了！

translation.en: There's very few players that have come through
translation.zh: 很少有球员像库珀一样

translation.en: with natural talents, like Cooper.
[commentator] Beautifully delivered! Wow!
[Mo] He might be our first Division 1 player out of Chinle.
translation.zh: 他有可能成为钦利的首位一级联赛球员

translation.en: [commentator] Pull up shot. Burbank trains to three.
translation.zh: 急停跳投 伯班克命中三分

translation.en: [Raul] He's one of those kids that you'll probably see every ten years as a coach,
translation.zh: 他这样的好苗子 教练可能每隔十年才能见到一个

translation.en: or maybe not at all, you know.
translation.zh: 或者一个都没有 我觉得

translation.en: And I think that, by the time he's done here,
translation.zh: 或者一个都没有 我觉得 他从这里毕业后 将成为…

translation.en: he's gonna be the GOAT of Chinle.
translation.zh: 他从这里毕业后 将成为… 钦利的史上最佳球员

translation.en: You know, he has that potential.
[Cooper] Many people tell me stuff.
translation.zh: 很多人跟我说过各种话

translation.en: Good and bad, you know.
I'm always taught to stay humble, you know.
translation.zh: 一直有人告诉我要保持谦虚

translation.en: Just, like, be a sponge, you know, and just take it in and get better,
translation.zh: 像海绵吸水一样不断学习 提升自己

translation.en: keep getting better.
Aah, here's all the players I look up to.
translation.zh: 这些都是我崇拜的球员

translation.en: Each person has something
that I watch or take from them.
I admire Stephen Curry with his shooting.
translation.zh: 我佩服斯蒂芬·库里的投篮技巧

translation.en: That's my favorite player, Kevin Durant, right there.
translation.zh: 那是我最喜欢的球员凯文·杜兰特

translation.en: The thing I like about Kevin Durant is, like...
he is a big man, and...
but he doesn't play like it, you know, he...
plays like a point guard, you know?
He can dribble and can shoot,
things that not even some point guards can do, you know?
translation.zh: 有时候连控球后卫都做不到

translation.en: He's doing it as... at the height of almost seven feet tall.
translation.zh: 他身高将近2.13米 却能做到

translation.en: And that's what I would like to do, as well.
As tall as I am, I would like to handle and shoot
translation.zh: 以我的身高我也想既会带球又会投篮

translation.en: just like him.
I'd like one day for someone to have, like...
my name across their back or something,
translation.zh: 有人会把我的名字纹在背上

translation.en: or even a poster of me.
[woman] Don't you have the roster?
The roster? I have a copy of it
on one of the clipboards.
Look for the clipboard.
You organized this.
-Like the blind leading the blind. -[both laugh]
Right here.
Okay. See, I told you it was on a clipboard.
translation.zh: 好 瞧 我说过夹在写字板上

translation.en: That part, I was right.
Ah, this is an old one.
Well, tell the guys to come and get their jerseys.
translation.zh: 好吧 让他们来领球衣

translation.en: -Okay. -That way we'll know
translation.zh: 那就知道谁穿几号球衣了

translation.en: -what jerseys they have. -Okay.
translation.zh: 那就知道谁穿几号球衣了 好

translation.en: [Josiah] Nervous for the season.
People have so much expectation for us.
We don't want to let them down.
We don't wanna give Chinle a bad rep.
translation.zh: 我们不想玷污钦利的名声

translation.en: It's not gonna fit. [chuckles] So...
Even if I do roll it up a few, I don't think it will fit me.
translation.zh: 就算往上卷一点 我穿也不合身

translation.en: Look at that. Look at that! [laughs]
[Chance] Our away games are pretty far.
translation.zh: 我们的客场比赛地点很远

translation.en: We basically just sleep on our away games,
translation.zh: 我们将一觉睡到客场比赛地

translation.en: and getting home late at night at 12:00.
We have to go to school the next day.
It's kind of hard, but it's fun. [laughs]
translation.zh: 很辛苦 不过很好玩

translation.en: [commentator] Hi, everyone, from Lobo Gymnasium in Snowflake, Arizona.
translation.zh: 大家好 这里是亚利桑那州雪花高中的灰狼体育馆

translation.en: Welcome to Northland basketball.
A big one tonight to kick off things,
translation.zh: 今晚的揭幕战将是一场恶战

translation.en: as two of the top teams in Arizona's 3A conference meet up.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州3A联赛的两支劲旅将狭路相逢

translation.en: That'll be us.
The pre-season rankings came out two days ago
translation.zh: 两天前揭晓了赛季前排名

translation.en: and Chinle starts off in the ninth spot.
The Lobos of Snowflake,
they're ranked number eight.
And come February,
the top 24 teams in Arizona make the state playoffs.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那州的前24强将进入季后赛

translation.en: Raul Mendoza certainly wants to be in that group.
translation.zh: 劳尔·门多萨一定想打进季后赛

translation.en: [Cooper] We can be pretty good, you know, we've got everything.
translation.zh: 我们会打得很好 我们很全面

translation.en: We've got the speed, we've got shooting, we've got rebounding.
translation.zh: 我们有速度 投篮和篮板球都不错

translation.en: So, we just need to put it all together
and make... and be one team.
[Raul] Yeah. A couple of things...
Don't take the first shot that's open.
Make sure that we... we take the shot that we can... that we want,
translation.zh: 我们要主动创造投篮机会

translation.en: not what they give us.
Another thing, don't get in a hurry.
When they press us, we're not gonna get in a hurry,
translation.zh: 对方紧逼时 不要心急 把球传到前场

translation.en: we're gonna get it across the court and set up and run the offense.
translation.zh: 对方紧逼时 不要心急 把球传到前场 组织进攻

translation.en: If they're big, like I heard they are,
translation.zh: 如果他们个头高大 我听说是这样

translation.en: then it's gonna be hard for them to get up and down the court.
translation.zh: 那他们来回奔跑会很困难

translation.en: We wanna go up and down the court, 'cause that's our strength.
translation.zh: 我们要来回奔跑因为这是我们的优势

translation.en: Josiah, he'll... he'll... he'll go. He's in shape.
translation.zh: 约西亚会上场 他状态很好

translation.en: He's not gonna get tired. He's just gonna run as hard as he can. Okay?
translation.zh: 他不会觉得累 他会拼命奔跑 懂吗？

translation.en: You're from the Navajo reservation.
translation.zh: 你们来自纳瓦霍族保留地

translation.en: We're here representing Chinle.
[Cooper] Let's go, let's go!
[Raul] A lot of people came from Chinle, and they're here.
translation.zh: 现场来了很多钦利的球迷

translation.en: -What up, Mo? -Yeah!
[Raul] It's something that motivates you to play hard.
translation.zh: 我觉得这能激励你们努力打好

translation.en: This is a chance for you guys to show what you can do as a team.
translation.zh: 这是你们展示球队实力的好机会

translation.en: [commentator] This ought to be a great matchup tonight.
It's a contrast in style.
The Lobos are a big team, the Wildcats a little bit small, a little bit quicker.
translation.zh: 灰狼队身材高大 野猫队略显矮小 但速度更快

translation.en: A legend on the rez, Coach Raul Mendoza.
translation.zh: 保留地的传奇教练劳尔·门多萨

translation.en: We'll get a first look at his team in action.
translation.zh: 今天是他的球队首次亮相

translation.en: Hey, the stands are full with devoted Wildcat fans
translation.zh: 观众席上坐满了热情的野猫队球迷

translation.en: and they're looking to start their season
on the right foot, as they get set to tip it up.
translation.zh: 旗开得胜 比赛即将开始

translation.en: [Raul] Behind you!
Snowflake controls the tip.
And they immediately blow past Josiah Tsosie
translation.zh: 并迅速突破约西亚·索西

translation.en: for the easy lay-in.
[Raul] Come to the ball!
Josiah Tsosie turns the ball over
and Snowflake takes it up the floor.
Come on. It was a weak pass.
translation.zh: 拜托 传球太差劲了

translation.en: Gotta take the ball the other way.
Hey, let's get a good shot.
Let's go. Get a good shot.
Ball goes into the left corner.
Cooper Burbank for three.
translation.zh: 库珀·伯班克三分球命中

translation.en: And the shot is good.
And the Wildcats are on the board.
Burbank again on the drive and...
Oh, a wild shot by Cooper.
[Raul] Gotta shoot it, go far up there.
translation.zh: 该投篮了 原地远投

translation.en: Time out.
We're just making mental mistakes.
You can't take shots like that.
If you don't have a shot,
just dribble it out or pull up,
You know, throwing it up is not gonna help us a whole lot.
translation.zh: 把球往上抛是没有用的

translation.en: Josiah Tsosie hits Burbank with a very nice feed
translation.zh: 约西亚·索西巧妙地将球传给伯班克

translation.en: and he finishes it off.
Josiah Tsosie in the corner. The three is up.
translation.zh: 约西亚·索西在角落里投出三分球

translation.en: The three is good.
It was a bumpy start, but Coach Mendoza got his team turned around,
translation.zh: 球队开场不顺但门多萨教练让球队找回了状态

translation.en: and now they're in a nice groove.
The Wildcats have grabbed an 11-point lead here at the break.
translation.zh: 中场休息时 野猫队领先对手11分

translation.en: [Raul] Now...
the thing that's killing us right now
is that we're doing things we're not supposed to do.
translation.zh: 我们的致命问题是 我们在做不该做的事

translation.en: We missed lay-ups, we just tried to finger roll.
translation.zh: 我们上篮不中 只知道用手指拨球

translation.en: Don't get greedy and try to force it when it's not there.
translation.zh: 不要贪心 没有机会就不要勉强投篮

translation.en: The idea is not how many shots we... we take,
it's how many good shots we take.
That's the difference between an average team, a mediocre team, and a good team.
translation.zh: 这就是平庸的球队和优秀球队的区别

translation.en: The team that do the little things, that make the lay-up,
translation.zh: 优秀的球队注重细节 制造上篮机会

translation.en: make the free throws, make the good passes...
translation.zh: 制造罚球 注重传好球…

translation.en: That's gonna be the difference.
You know, right now, we're up,
-but we've got a whole half to go, guys. -[Cooper] Let's go.
Back to the action here at Snowflake High School
translation.zh: 比赛在雪花高中继续进行

translation.en: early in the second half.
It's been all Wildcats.
translation.zh: 野猫队控制了场上局势

translation.en: Cooper Burbank, the crossover... pull up...
translation.zh: 库珀·伯班克 交叉过人 急停…

translation.en: The shot is good.
-Wildcats' lead has grown to 18. -[whistle blows]
translation.zh: 野猫队的领先优势扩大到了18分

translation.en: We're up! We can go further, but we've gotta be smart.
translation.zh: 我们领先 还可以扩大领先优势但我们必须聪明一点

translation.en: Hey, don't beat ourselves. Let's go.
[commentator] Josiah Tsosie trapped, his pass, right to the Lobos,
translation.zh: 约西亚·索西被包围了 他的传球直接被灰狼队拦截

translation.en: they'll take it the other way
and there's the lay-in.
Be patient.
Josiah Tsosie drives, forces up the shot, gets off the mark.
translation.zh: 约西亚·索西突破强行投篮 没有进

translation.en: [Raul] Josiah!
And Snowflake has got the ball again.
[Raul] Shoot us out of the game.
Go get him.
He just wants to shoot the ball.
Josiah!
Coach Mendoza has decided to give his point guard a rest.
translation.zh: 门多萨教练决定让控球后卫休息一下

translation.en: He heads to the bench with eight points... but five turnovers.
translation.zh: 他走向替补席 得了八分 但有五次失误

translation.en: Come on. You gotta get your head in the game.
translation.zh: 过来 你得专心一点

translation.en: Snowflake jump shot, eight.
translation.zh: 雪花高中跳投 还落后八分

translation.en: Snowflake might have a pulse here.
translation.zh: 雪花高中也许还有一线生机

translation.en: They score a couple of quick buckets, give their fans some hope.
translation.zh: 他们接连得分 给了球迷一线希望

translation.en: [Raul] We can't let 'em get back in the game.
We have to be disciplined.
Play better defense. Okay?
Lobos on the drive, the dish,
Cooper steals the pass.
It's knocked away...
and it might have gone off Cooper's legs.
And it's Snowflake's basketball.
-Cooper! -[whistle blows]
-He's just not there. -Yeah.
Stay in the game!
Don't... Don't space out!
-Hey, focus on what you're doing. -[buzzer sounds]
[commentator] The Wildcats' lead is dwindling.
translation.zh: 野猫队的领先优势正在缩小

translation.en: The Lobos are not gonna go away quietly.
translation.zh: 灰狼队不打算轻易认输

translation.en: They keep hanging around out there.
[Raul] Listen, keep playing!
Don't give up!
You gotta want it more than they do!
translation.zh: 你们必须比对手更加渴望胜利

translation.en: [commentator] And the game is tied, 69-69.
Unbelievable.
The Snowflake Lobos have battled
translation.zh: 雪花高中灰狼队奋起直追

translation.en: all the way back from 18 down to knotted up.
The Wildcats need somebody,
anybody to step up on offense.
-[Raul] Time out. -[whistle blows]
Now, listen. This is what we're doing.
Cooper, you're right here.
You're gonna act ike you're gonna set the pick,
and just go, okay?
And then Josiah, you're here.
Okay? One of you guys are gonna get it.
translation.zh: 你们总有一个人能得分

translation.en: So, with the game on the line,
it looks like Josiah Tsosie is coming back in.
translation.zh: 似乎约西亚·索西要回到场上了

translation.en: [all] One, two, three, WIldcats!
Snowflake with pressure defense,
Chance Harvey brings it up the left side and up from there.
translation.zh: 钱斯·哈维将球带到左侧 将球传到禁区顶端约西亚·索西拿到球

translation.en: Back to the top, Josiah Tsosie has it.
translation.zh: 将球传到禁区顶端约西亚·索西拿到球

translation.en: And a pass nearly stolen by the Lobos.
translation.zh: 传球差点被灰狼队抢断

translation.en: But Burbank picks it up, saves it for the Wildcats.
translation.zh: 但伯班克抢到了球 让野猫队躲过一劫

translation.en: Sixty-nine, sixty-nine.
Dewayne Tom on the right angle. Nothing there for him.
translation.zh: 德韦恩·汤姆角度不错没有人防守他

translation.en: Passes it up, swing it around left side.
Seconds to play.
Cooper Burbank from the corner,
translation.zh: 库珀·伯班克从角落里投篮

translation.en: a three up and good!
The Wildcats have made the shot,
and Chinle is gonna come away
with a victory at Snowflake, 72 to 69,
to begin their brand-new season.
[Raul] Okay, we've gotta look at this tonight
translation.zh: 好 今晚我们要回顾这场比赛

translation.en: as something to learn from.
Good to win, but again, look at how we played.
translation.zh: 赢球是好事 但我还是要说看看你们的表现

translation.en: All those mental mistakes...
translation.zh: 那些心理原因导致的失误…

translation.en: We can't have it.
We could have beat them by 15 or more, easily.
translation.zh: 本来可以轻轻松松地赢他们15分以上

translation.en: But we seem like we...
When we got ahead, some of you guys relaxed. You can't do that.
translation.zh: 我们领先时 有人松懈了 不可以这样

translation.en: You gotta keep playing through the whole thing.
translation.zh: 我们必须整场比赛全力以赴

translation.en: Otherwise, you know, it was a win...
translation.zh: 否则 比赛虽然赢了 但是…

translation.en: but this is something you... In order to beat a tough team,
you've gotta be mentally tough too.
translation.zh: 你们的心理素质必须强大

translation.en: I thought mentally, we lost in the second half.
translation.zh: 就心理素质而言 我们输掉了下半场

translation.en: We weren't there mentally, and that was the biggest thing. That's just something you've gotta learn.
translation.zh: 你们心不在焉 这是最大的问题必须吸取这个教训

translation.en: Look at yourself in the mirror and say,
translation.zh: 我要你们对着镜子问自己

translation.en: "What did I do that I need to correct?"
All of us can go down and say, "What did I do that I need to correct?"
translation.zh: 所有人都要问问自己“我有哪些方面做得不够好？”

translation.en: And that's how you become better as individuals.
translation.zh: 只有这样 每个人才能不断进步

translation.en: And as a team, we're gonna get better as we go.
translation.zh: 作为球队  我们也将不断进步

translation.en: Okay?
Break. Go.
-[Cooper] Wildcats on three. -One, two, three. Wildcats!
Put your jerseys in one area so we can pick them up.
translation.zh: 把球衣放在一起 便于我们收拾

translation.en: [Raul] As a head coach, I've seen kids that are very... talented,
translation.zh: 作为主教练我见过非常有天分的孩子

translation.en: very good players,
but didn't even get a chance to go to state playoffs.
translation.zh: 却没有机会进入州季后赛

translation.en: [player] My man, 27 points, Coop!
[player 2] Damn, Coop.
[Raul] Good shot, Coop.
I always try to get the kids to understand
translation.zh: 我一直想让孩子们明白

translation.en: that getting into the playoffs is a special thing.
translation.zh: 季后赛不是随随便便就能进的

translation.en: A lot of it is the mental thing.
Everything has to fall in place to win the state championship.
translation.zh: 只有方方面面都做好了才有可能夺得州冠军

translation.en: You know, this team that we have, we have a group of seniors.
translation.zh: 我们这支球队有很多高三学生

translation.en: We're gonna lose 'em next year.
You know, our guys have to learn
to realize the urgency, I guess you could say.
translation.zh: 认识到紧迫性 可以这样说

translation.en: We have the capability of winning the whole thing.
Why not go for it now?
It's your time to accomplish the impossible,
translation.zh: 现在是你们创造奇迹的时候

translation.en: which is something that we've never done here in Chinle,
translation.zh: 钦利从来没有人做到过

translation.en: win a state championship.
So I'm hoping that the kids are starting to begin to understand
translation.zh: 所以我希望孩子们明白

translation.en: that this... this is it. This is the time to do it.
translation.zh: 现在正是时候 要夺冠就趁现在

translation.en: This is the year.
